text: Pteroxygonum is a Polygonaceae genus, related to Fallopia. A few species of the latter have been merged on it, such as F.denticulata. ==Species== P denticulatum (C.C.Huang)TM Schust et Reveal (bas.Polygonum denticulatum) P giraldii Dammer et Diels (syn. Fagopyrum giraldii K.Haralson) Schuster, Tanja M.; Reveal, James L.; Bayly, Michael J. & Kron, Kathleen A. (2015). "An updated molecular phylogeny of Polygonoideae (Polygonaceae): Relationships of Oxygonum, Pteroxygonum, and Rumex, and a new circumscription of Koenigia". Taxon. 64 (6): 1188â€“1208. ==References== Category:Polygonaceae
title: Pteroxygonum
